isoi Bulgarian Rose Intensive Cleansing Oil

Brand: isoi

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Polyglyceryl-2 Sesquioleate, Polyglyceryl-10 Caprylate/Caprate, Polyglyceryl-10 Decaoleate, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed O

ia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil
